            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-fa49192c-892a-44bc-8bc5-8fa223d5cf45');

        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-8ff4de77-b230-4267-b4c1-29c0b7a1d065');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();

                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><style>

.agrupamento-vertical-simples .glb-hl-style-informe-publicitario .chapeu {
    color: #fff !important;
}

.nano>.pane {
    z-index: 12;
}
</style><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    window.onload= function() {
         if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
     }
})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 27/03/2017 18:26:00 --></html>

    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div     (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);

        SVCPesquisaDone = true;

    }

    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);

    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);

        {{if image}}
        <a href="${url}" title="${title}" class="gui-link-image gui-highlight-item-link gui-color-primary-parent-hover gui-image-hover"><figure class="gui-image-full"><img src="${image}"

(function ($, window, undefined){
    "use strict";

    $(function () {
        var popinElement = $('[data-gui-popin=".mais-esportes-popin"]');

        var menuDestaque = $(".widget-menu-destaques");
        var widget = new WidgetMenuDestaques(menuDestaque, {
            quantidade: "16"
        });
        popinElement.on('appended.gui.gui-popin', function () {
            widget.bindSubitemClick();
        });
        widget.init();

        // Dropdown options
        // event trigger changes if we have touch support or not
        var activateEvent = 'click',
            enableOverlay = true;

        // for desktop
        if ($('html').hasClass('no-touch')) {
            activateEvent = 'hover';
            enableOverlay = false;
        }

        new GUI.Tab($('.gui-tab', menuDestaque));
        new GUI.Dropdown(popinElement, {
            activateEvent: activateEvent,
            enableOverlay: enableOverlay,
            mouseoverDelay: 400,
            boundToElement: '.widget-menu-destaques .gui-tab',
            position: "right" // no desktop. no mobile, center
        });
    });

}(jQuery, window));
</script></div><div class="small-5 medium-5 large-5 columns"><section id="ge-card-programacao-canais-04236f6d-56c4-4737-81ec-638e75a65506" class="gui-card ge-card-programacao-canais " data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="agora no sportv"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h1 class="gui-text-title"><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/programacao/" title="Agora no SporTV" data-track-click="clique | header" data-track-value="0" data-track-noninteraction="false">Agora no SporTV</a></h1></header><section class="gui-card-content"><ul class="ge-card-programacao-canais-list">

                <a href="${equipe_url}" title="${equipe.nome_popular}" class="escudos">
            {{else}}
                <span title="${equipe.nome_popular}" class="escudos">
            {{/if}}
                <img width="30" height="30" alt="${equipe.nome_popular}" src="${equipe.escudos['30x30']}">
            {{if equipe_url}}
                </a>
            {{else}}
                </span>
            {{/if}}
        </td><td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-sigla" data-equipe="${equipe.slug}">
            {{if equipe_url}}
                <a href="${equipe_url}" title="${equipe.nome_popular}" alt="${equipe.nome_popular}">
            {{/if}}
                <span alt="${equipe.nome_popular}" title="${equipe.nome_popular}">${equipe.sigla} </span>
            {{if equipe_url}}
                </a>
            {{/if}}
        </td><td class="ge-card-classificacao-col"><div class="ge-card-classificacao-variacao"><span>${variacao}</span><span class="sprite-variacao sprite-${variacao_label}"></span></div></td><td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-pontos">${pontos}</td><td rel="aproveitamento_ultimos_jogos" class="ge-card-classificacao-aproveitamento tabela-pontos-ultimos-jogos">
            {{if aproveitamento_ultimos_jogos != null}}
                <div class="aproveitamento_ultimos_jogos"></div>
            {{/if}}
        </td></tr></script><script id="template_classificacao_pontos_corridos_posicao_aproveitamento" type="text/x-jQuery-tmpl"><span class="ge-card-classificacao-resultado tabela-icone tabela-icone-circulo tabela-icone-${aproveitamento}"><div class="ge-tooltip center"><div class="content content-barra ge-card-classificacao-getooltip-content"><div class="content-tooltip">
                    ${jogo.equipe_mandante.sigla} <strong>${jogo.placar_oficial_mandante}</strong><span class="versus">&times;</span><strong>${jogo.placar_oficial_visitante}</strong> ${jogo.equipe_visitante.sigla}
                </div></div><div class="background"></div><div class="arrow center"><img src="http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/globoesporte/img/comum/seta_tooltip.png"></div></div></span></script><script id="template_classificacao_mata_mata" type="text/x-jQuery-tmpl"><section class="gui-card-content ge-card-classificacao-mata-mata"><div class="ge-card-classificacao-tabelas nano altura-mata-mata"><div class="content"><div class="nome-fase"><span>${nome_fase}</span></div><div class="chaves"></div></div></div></section></script><script id="template_classificacao_mata_mata_chave" type="text/x-jQuery-tmpl"><li class="jogo">

        {{if jogo.url_transmissao != null || jogo.url_confronto != null}}

$(document).ready(function() {
    "use strict";

    if($('.glb-grid-24')){

        var cardId = '#ge-card-classificacao-c68192c5-b9a3-483b-a6cf-e163d3c2e9dc',
                classificacaoFeedReady = false,
                classificacaoCardReady = false;

            $(document).on('bastian-feed-card_rendered', cardId, function() {
                console.debug('Classificacao: Feed Ready');
                classificacaoFeedReady = true;
                initCardClassificacao();
            });

            $(document).on('card-classificacao-ready', function() {
                console.debug('Classificacao: Card Ready');
                classificacaoCardReady = true;
                initCardClassificacao();
            });

        var initCardClassificacao = function(){
            if(classificacaoCardReady && classificacaoFeedReady){
                $('#ge-card-classificacao-c68192c5-b9a3-483b-a6cf-e163d3c2e9dc').show();
            }
        }
    }

    try {

      var classificacao = new CardClassificacao({
        context: '#ge-card-classificacao-c68192c5-b9a3-483b-a6cf-e163d3c2e9dc'
      });

      var classificacaoTracking = new CardClassificacaoTracking("c68192c5-b9a3-483b-a6cf-e163d3c2e9dc");

    } catch (err) {}

});
</script><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_rm2"><div id="banner_rm2" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><section

<script type="text/javascript">
  var cancelarRefresh;
  cancelarRefresh = function () {
  };
  
  var OT_DELAY = 180000;
  REFRESH_TIMEOUT = null;

  function iniciarRefresh() {
      REFRESH_TIMEOUT = setTimeout(function () {
          window.location.reload();
      }, OT_DELAY);
  }
  iniciarRefresh();
  cancelarRefresh = function () {
    clearTimeout(REFRESH_TIMEOUT);
    console && console.log && console.log("Refresh cancelado");
  };

  $(window).scroll(function(){
      cancelarRefresh();
      iniciarRefresh();
  });

  
</script>

<script>

	var menuOffset = 300;
	$(document).on("scroll", function(){
	       var docScroll = $(document).scrollTop();
	       if(docScroll >= menuOffset) { 
	           $("#floating-bar").addClass("fixed");
			   $("#floating-bar").slideDown(300);
	           //dynamically change the width of floating bar according to it's width of previous state 
	       }else {
			   $("#floating-bar").slideUp(300,function(){
				   $("#floating-bar").removeClass("fixed");
			   });
	       }
	});


</script>

	Div Flutuante Login:
 -->

<div class="hide">
	<div id="float-forgotten" class="inline-content poster twelve columns">
	
		<div class="blockUI blockOverlay"></div>	

		<div class="column box-bg">
			<form method="post" onsubmit="return false;" id="floatForgottenPasswordForm">
				<div class="twelve column top">
					<div class="six column title">
						Recuperar Senha
					</div>
					<div class="six column">
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/btn-email-close.png" alt="Fechar" title="Fechar" id="close-forgotten">	
					</div>
				</div>
				<h3 class="form-error form-login twelve"></h3>
				<div class="twelve column form-login">
					<div class="twelve column input">
						<p>Digite o Email de seu cadastro:</p>
						<input type="text" name="reset_loginname" id="input-name" />
					</div>

				</div>	
				<div class="twelve column form-more">
					<div class="six column input">
					</div>
					<div class="six column input">
						<input type="submit" id="bt-login" value="entrar" />
					</div>
				</div> 
				<input type="hidden" name="login_site" value="2.627"/>
			</form>
		</div>	
	</div>
</div>

<script>
	var validator;
	jQuery().ready(function() {
	 	var validation = {
		 	rules: {
		 		reset_loginname: {
	            	required: true,
	                email: true
	            }
		 	},
            messages:{
            	reset_loginname:{
                	required:"O campo email é obrigatório",
                    email:"O campo email precisa ser preenchido com um email válido"
            	}
            },
            submitHandler: function(form) {
            	$(form).find("#bt-login").attr("disabled",true);	
				sempre.login.resetPassword(form);
			}
		 }

	 	validator = jQuery("#floatForgottenPasswordForm").validate(validation);
	});
	
</script>

 -->

                    <span style="color: #fff">
    
                        5</span></p>

					<a href="javascript:facebooklogin();" class="btn-fb" >
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-fb-login.jpg" alt="Logar com Facebook" title="Logar com Facebook" class="social-plugin bt-login-fb">	
					</a>

<script>
	var validator;
	jQuery().ready(function() {
	 	var validation = {
		 	rules: {
		 		login_loginname: {
	            	required: true,
	                email: true
	            },
	            login_password:{
	            	required:true
	            }
		 	},
            messages:{
            	login_loginname:{
                	required:"O campo email é obrigatório",
                    email:"O campo email precisa ser preenchido com um email válido"
            	},
            	 login_password:{
 	            	required:"O campo senha é obrigatório"
 	            }
            },
            submitHandler: function(form) {
            	$(form).find("#bt-login").attr("disabled",true);	
				sempre.login.login(form);
			}
		 }

	 	validator = jQuery("#floatLoginForm").validate(validation);
	});
	
</script>

<div class="twelve columns top"><h5>Veja os filmes em cartaz</h5></div>
<div class="twelve columns busca-assunto" data-elemento="cinema-filtror">
    <div class="twelve columns info">
        <div class="twelve columns">
            <div class="row input">
                <div class="six columns align-left"">
                    <select id="PorFilme">
                        <option value="">-- Filmes --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="six columns align-right">
                    <select id="PorGenero">
                        <option value="">-- Gêneros --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row input">
                <div class="six columns align-left">
                    <select id="PorCinema">
                        <option value="">-- Cinemas --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="six columns align-right">
                    <input id="PalavraChave" placeholder="Palavra-chave" type="text" value="">
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="twelve columns buscar-filme">
                <button id="BuscaFilme" class="btn">Buscar</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    function abreFiltro() {
        var id = $(this).attr("id");
        var value = $(this).val();

        window.location.href = "/diversão/roteiros-culturais/cinema?" + id + "=" + value;
    }

    $("#BuscaFilme").click(function () {
        var valor = $("#PalavraChave").val();
        if (valor) {
            window.location.href = "/diversão/roteiros-culturais/cinema?busca=" + valor;
        }

        return false;
    });


    var $SELECTS = [$("#PorFilme"), $("#PorGenero"), $("#PorCinema")];

    var json = {"CinemaFiltros":{"PorFilme":{"Registro":[{"ID":"2864","Valor":"A Bela e a Fera"},{"ID":"2876","Valor":"A Grande Muralha"},{"ID":"2860","Valor":"Cinquenta Tons Mais Escuros"},{"ID":"2903","Valor":"Era o Hotel Cambridge"},{"ID":"2900","Valor":"Fragmentado"},{"ID":"2895","Valor":"Hiroshima, Meu Amor"},{"ID":"2890","Valor":"Insubstitu\u00edvel"},{"ID":"2875","Valor":"Internet - O Filme"},{"ID":"2888","Valor":"Kong: A Ilha da Caveira"},{"ID":"2865","Valor":"Lego Batman - O Filme"},{"ID":"2873","Valor":"Lion - Uma Jornada para Casa"},{"ID":"2878","Valor":"Logan"},{"ID":"2881","Valor":"Moonlight: Sob a Luz do Luar"},{"ID":"2897","Valor":"O Filho de Joseph"},{"ID":"2896","Valor":"Pedro Osmar, Pra Liberdade Que Se Conquista"},{"ID":"2902","Valor":"Power Rangers"},{"ID":"2901","Valor":"T2 Trainspotting"},{"ID":"2827","Valor":"Tinha que Ser Ele? (*)"}]},"PorGenero":{"Registro":[{"ID":"1","Valor":"A\u00e7\u00e3o"},{"ID":"2","Valor":"Anima\u00e7\u00e3o"},{"ID":"3","Valor":"Aventura"},{"ID":"4","Valor":"Com\u00e9dia"},{"ID":"19","Valor":"Com\u00e9dia Dram\u00e1tica"},{"ID":"6","Valor":"Document\u00e1rio"},{"ID":"7","Valor":"Drama"},{"ID":"16","Valor":"Drama \/ Romance"},{"ID":"20","Valor":"Fantasia"},{"ID":"13","Valor":"Suspense"}]},"PorCinema":{"Registro":[{"ID":"14","Valor":"Belas"},{"ID":"19","Valor":"Betim "},{"ID":"2","Valor":"BH Shopping (Cineplex)"},{"ID":"3","Valor":"Big"},{"ID":"681","Valor":"Boulevard"},{"ID":"299","Valor":"Cidade"},{"ID":"686","Valor":"Contagem"},{"ID":"10","Valor":"Del Rey"},{"ID":"11","Valor":"Diamond Mall (Cineplex)"},{"ID":"683","Valor":"Esta\u00e7\u00e3o BH"},{"ID":"13","Valor":"Ita\u00fa Power Shopping"},{"ID":"12","Valor":"Minas Shopping"},{"ID":"688","Valor":"Monte Carmo "},{"ID":"16","Valor":"Norte"},{"ID":"15","Valor":"Pampulha Mall"},{"ID":"18","Valor":"Paragem"},{"ID":"687","Valor":"Partage Shopping Betim"},{"ID":"8","Valor":"P\u00e1tio Savassi (Cinemark)"},{"ID":"21","Valor":"Ponteio"},{"ID":"20","Valor":"Via Shopping"}]}}};
    var cf = json.CinemaFiltros;

    for (var i in $SELECTS) {
        var $select = $SELECTS[i];
        $select.on("change", abreFiltro);
        var id = $select.attr("id");

        var dados = cf[id].Registro;

        for (var j in dados) {
            var item = dados[j];

            var $option = $("<option value='" + item.ID + "'>" + item.Valor + "</option>")

            $select.append($option);
        }
    }

    $("#PorFilme").val("");
    $("#PorGenero").val("");
    $("#PorCinema").val("");


</script>

    </div>

          $(function(){

            if (false && window.Polopoly && Polopoly.preview && !$("body").hasClass('super-noticia')) {
              Polopoly.preview.initialize();
              Polopoly.preview.initPageManager();
              Polopoly.preview.toolbar.initialize(Polopoly.Localization.Toolbar);

                      loadDone = true;
                  }
              };

		var googletag = googletag || {};
		googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];
		(function() {
			var gads = document.createElement('script');
			gads.async = true;
			gads.type = 'text/javascript';
			var useSSL = 'https:' == document.location.protocol;
			gads.src = (useSSL ? 'https:' : 'http:') +
			'//www.googletagservices.com/tag/js/gpt.js';
			var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
			node.parentNode.insertBefore(gads, node);
		})();
	</script>


    <!-- chamada dos banners de portal o tempo -->
